attributes.text:
Support string/array generics as introduced with JavaScript 1.6 for
all browsers.

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/JavaScript/New_in_JavaScript/1.6#Array_and_String_generics

*Array*

* join
* reverse
* sort
* push
* pop
* shift
* unshift
* splice
* concat
* slice
* indexOf
* lastIndexOf
* forEach
* map
* filter
* some
* every

*String*

* quote
* substring
* toLowerCase
* toUpperCase
* charAt
* charCodeAt
* indexOf
* lastIndexOf
* toLocaleLowerCase
* toLocaleUpperCase
* localeCompare
* match
* search
* replace
* split
* substr
* concat
* slice
Please check other classes in qx.lang to get the same features.
Initialize all generic functions as defined in JavaScript 1.6.
the object in which prototype the function is defined.
name of the method to wrap.

Make a method of an object generic and return the generic functions.
The generic function takes as first parameter the object the method operates on.
wrapped method. This function takes as first argument an instance of obj and as following arguments the arguments of the original method.
